DOC.brief_summary: Chuvash polycythemia ( CP ) rare form congenital polycythemia cause mutation VHL gene . Currently , therapy prove effective CP . Recent study demonstrate VHL ( von Hippel-Lindau tumor suppressor ) regulate activity JAK2 ( Janus kinase 2 ) . In mouse model , inhibition JAK2 reverse CP phenotype . Therefore , investigator hypothesize JAK2 inhibition may significant clinical benefit CP patient .
